title: WTB A Couple of N172 Oddballs
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: WTB A Couple of N172 Oddballs
posts.post_content:
Looking to acquire a few (4 to be exact) oddball N172s, mostly to fill out "subsets" (such as players from New Jersey teams) or replace poses I don't like. Cards can be raw and don't have to be mint condition, but need to have a decent image. 

Any help is greatly appreciated.

230-6               William HolbertJersey City Skeeters
250-4Henry KappellCincinnati Red Stockings
258-2Rudolph KemmlerSaint Paul Apostles
284-5Harry LyonsJersey City Skeeters

PM on Net 54 or emails to [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url].

I won't be able to post to the "Show Some OJ Subsets" thread until I find the Jersey City Skeeters players I'm missing! :D

Help with that anyone?

Bump

Added Henry Kappell to the original list. I prefer this pose (250-4) over the one I already have.
Bump
Did you grab the Pete Connell in the LOTG auction? I made a run at it, but price got a bit too steep for me.

As much as I wish I could tell you I won the Connell in LOTG, I wound up eating the dust of whover ran that one up. I am still stunned that at least two people were willing to bid that card that high. WOW! :eek:
I’ll admit to being one of the people that got caught up in the bidding on that one. I eventually let it go, as there are too many other Des Moines cards that I still need.
I will admit to running it up. Only pose for Connell. Glad to have that one checked off my list.
Still need these 5 oddballs...
Been a month, so...BUMP!
Friendly monthly reminder bump...

Another bump.

Come on...someone out there has to have a spare Kemmler 258-2 and/or Kappell 250-4! :D
LOL, begging doesn't help.
I know you couldn't see me, but I was on my knees! :D
Still looking...
Pity bump 🥲
All help (or pity) is appreciated!
It's been almost 4 months since I bumped this post. Still looking for the team and/or pose variations above. Can anyone out there give me a Christmas present?  :D

List has changed. Still looking for 4 oddballs: 

230-6               William Holbert(Jersey City Skeeters)
250-4Henry Kappell(Cincinnati Red Stockings)
258-2Rudolph Kemmler(Saint Paul Apostles)
284-5Harry Lyons(Jersey City Skeeters)


Help a brother out!

Still looking for a couple of commons (Kappell and Kemler) and a couple Jersey City Skeeters (Holbert and Lyons).

Please IM me with any you might have available yourself or know of their whereabouts.

I wish I had extras so we could put an end to this. Kevin is starting to embarrass himself. 🤣
